document.docAuthor: Carleton, Michael D. & Goodman, Steven M.
document.masterDocTitle: A New Species of the Eliurus majori Complex (Rodentia: Muroidea: Nesomyidae) from South-central Madagascar, with Remarks on Emergent Species Groupings in the Genus Eliurus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A New Species of the Eliurus majori Complex (Rodentia: Muroidea: Nesomyidae) from South-central Madagascar, with Remarks on Emergent Species Groupings in the Genus Eliurus

paragraph.heading:
ELIURUS AFF.
E . MAJORI
GROUP: Mahajanga

subSubSection.paragraph: cation manual, Part 6.2: 1–4. Washington , DC: Smithsonian Institution Press. [not continuously paginated, parts issued separately]

Raxworthy, C.J., and R.A. Nussbaum. 1996. Pattern of endemism for terrestrial vertebrates in eastern Madagascar . In W.R. Lourenço (editor), Biogéographie de Madagascar : 369–383. Paris: ORSTOM, x + 588 pp.

Raxworthy, C.J., and R.A. Nussbaum. 1997. Biogeographic patterns of reptiles in eastern Madagascar . In S.M. Goodman and B.D. Patterson (editors), Natural change and human impact in Madagascar : 124–141. Washington, D. C: Smithsonian Institution Press, xiii + 432 pp.

Wilmé (editors), Nouveaux résultats d’inventaires biologiques faisant référence à l’altitude dans la région des massifs montagneux de Marojejy et d’Anjanaharibe- Sud. ELIURUS AFF.
E . TANALA
GROUP: Antsiranana Province : Forêt de Binara, 7.5 km SW Daraina, near Analamazava River, 325–550 m , 13 ° 15.3 9 S, 49 ° 37.0 9 E (FMNH 172665–172675). Mahajanga Province : RS de Maningoza (FMNH 167562). Mahajanga Province : Bekopaka (MNHN 1966.221); PN de Bemaraha, 2.5 km NE Bekopaka, Ankidrodroa, 100 m , 19 ° 07.9 9 S, 44 ° 48.5 9 E (FMNH 172722); PN de Bemaraha, 3.5 km E Bekopaka, near Tombeau Vazimba, 100 m , 19 ° 08.4 9 S, 44 ° 49.7 9 E (FMNH 172723– 172725).

ELIURUS ANTSINGY :
Antsiranana Province : Forêt d’Ambilondambo, 5 km N Daraina, Andrafia, 300– 550 m , 13 ° 09.9 9 S, 49 ° 38.9 9 E (UADBA 46062, 46072, 46073); Forêt de Bobankora, 11 km ESE Daraina, Beantely, 350–550 m , 13 ° 13.4 9 S, 49 ° 45.6 9 E (UADBA 46101); RS d’Ankarana, 2.6 km E Andrafiabe, forest near Andrafiabe Cave, 50 m , 12 ° 55.9 9 S, 49 ° 03.4 9 E (FMNH 169718–169720); RS d’Ankarana, 7.5 km NW Mahamasina, Anilotra, 125 m , 12 ° 54.5 9 S, 49 ° 06.6 9 E (FMNH 173104–173106, 173109); RS d’Ankarana, 10 km NW Mahamasina, 100 m , 12 ° 53.2 9 S, 49 ° 06.6 9 E (FMNH 173107, 173108). Mahajanga Province : RNI [now PN] de Namoroka (FMNH 167563–167566; UADBA 16169); RNI [now PN] de Namoroka, 26 km NW Andranomavo, Forêt d’Ambovonomby, 200 m , 16 ° 28.2 9 S, 45 ° 20.9 9 E (FMNH 175909–175911); RNI [now PN] de Namoroka, 31 km NW Andranomavo, Forêt de Mahabo, 100 m , 16 ° 23.4 9 S, 45 ° 20.9 9 E (FMNH 175912, 175913). Mahajanga Province : Antsingy forest near Bekopaka, ca. 19 ° 07.5 9 S, 44 ° 49.0 9 E (MNHN 1966.2220, 1966.2222); PN de Bemaraha, 3.5 km E Bekopaka, near Tombeau Vazimba, 100 m , 19 ° 08.4 9 S, 44 ° 49.7 9 E (FMNH 172721).
